recipesJson.name: Rosa Resolutions | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, and Folkart.
2019 is almost over, and it's time to pop the bubbly for 2020! This is a sparkling Rosa infused with cranberry and currant, perfect for your New Year celebration.  Full flavor notes on DEVELOPED Episode 42 at https://youtu.be/NIJdx1sy31o .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

reviews.text: Super fizzy, really sparkles. Mostly hits the profile of champagne with currants and cranberry. Very tart cranberry. Plenty of sweetness. A little funky down low, as the currant should be, but overall but has a really crisp, clean taste . There’s quite a bit of lemony citrus here that isn’t accounted for in the profile... kinda tastes like what would happen if FlavourArt put out a “champagne, cranberry, and currant” flavor. Like WTF is all this lemon doing here? But it’s hard to stay mad at it because it’s pretty freakin tasty if you don’t mind lemon.
